      • compil

        public static java.io.File compil(Compiler.NameCode... nameCodes)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Compile several class in same time (Use full if a class need an other one to compil them in same time)
        Parameters:
        nameCodes - Couples of name/code to compile
        Returns:
        Directory where generated the .class files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - On read/write problem
